title: Samsung's new 8K TV is truly dazzling —and it's a whopping 40 percent off right now!
text:
Yahoo Lifestyle is committed to finding you the best products at the best prices. We may receive a share from purchases made via links on this page.

Move over 4K, here comes 8K! (Photo: Walmart) More

Looking for a luxury TV at a discount price?

Walmart has seriously marked down the new Samsung 65-inch Class 8K (yes, we said 8K) UHD HDR10+ Smart QLED TV to $2,998— a mind-blowing $2,002 off the retail price of $5,000.



Released in February 2019, this is Samsung’s latest 8K model. It offers an insane 7680×4320 8K resolution, which is four times the resolution of 4K and 16 times that of full HD. Needless to say, this is the sharpest, most detailed, and most color-accurate picture you can get from a Samsung TV.

What's the difference between 8K and 4K? (Photo: Getty Images) More

The TV has a gargantuan 65-inch QLED display with the company’s own “Quantum Dot” technology for exceptional color contrast. Trust us, you’re not going to get a better viewing experience at home.

Even if you don’t have 8K movies and TV shows that are readily available to watch, this TV uses Samsung’s 8K A.I. upscaling, which converts 4K videos into near-8K content. It’s also great for gaming and watching live sports thanks to the “Motion Rate 240” (240Hz refresh rate) and “Real Game Enhancer” settings built-in for smooth and steady action with low lag time.

This 8K TV is also smart home compatible— Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, and Samsung’s Bixby are all included. Netflix, Amazon Prime, HBO Now, Hulu, CBS All Access and even Apple AirPlay 2 and Apple TV are all ready to stream out-of-the-box.

In addition, the Samsung 65-inch Class 8K HDR10+ Smart QLED TV comes with four HDMI ports for Blu-ray players and video game consoles and three USB ports for thumb drives and external hard drives. It also supports Dolby Digital Plus for spectacular audio and surround sound.

With its 65-inch size, smart and streaming features built in, and outstanding 8K picture quality, this deal is great for anyone who wants to get a jump on future technology at a considerably low price point.

This 8K TV has a 4.8 out of five stars with hundreds of positive reviews. (Photo: Walmart) More





Reviewers are raving:

“I received my QLED 8K 65-inch about a month ago,” a satisfied shopper wrote. “I am still amazed every day at the clarity of the picture. Colors are amazing. Set up was a breeze with one connect box. I looked at competition and the OLEDs and decided Samsung had everyone beat, hands down. I am so happy with this TV. Still exploring the many apps and features. I highly recommend this tv over everything out there. Best picture and just do not know how it could be any better.”

“I thought that the 4K QLED was the best TV I have ever seen until I saw the 8K QLED,” another stunned shopper wrote. “The picture is beyond anything I have ever watched. It is like looking out the window, the colors are beyond belief. So glad I got it.”

Shop it: Samsung 65-inch Class 8K UHD HDR10+ Smart QLED TV (UN65Q900) — 2019 Model, $2,998 (was $5,000), walmart.com
